1.content:
Okay, let's get started.

Who falls for you?
1.title: The Beggining.

11.content:
Okay.

Now, who falls for you?
11.title: One or more girls from Takashi's group.

113.content: Chaos, normal or other powers?
113.title: Rei Miyamoto

114.content: Chaos, normal or other powers?
114.title: Saya Takagi.

1142.content:
(Character name is Haru)
It's the middle of the school year and already things appear to be bleak. The school year is already seems it is just a long and overworking pacebreaker. You had other things on your mind mainly with an old friend, Takashi.

He seemed troubled about something but you never quite understood what it was. You thought of skipping class but decided he could wait, while you always complained about school you still did what was asked of you.

You weren't like the morons who skip school and act like a bunch of street thugs.You were more of the smart ass kids who do your work but never liked doing it.

It's almost the end of class and it seemed normal until....
1142.title: Meet Haru

11423.content:
The announcement goes off and you hear the school principal in complete fear that something is going on. For some reason, he's sounding very frightened but it all makes sense when the screams of pain and agony fills the speaker and it's clear to everyone what just happened.

You stood up knowing how everyone might react so you hid under your desk for the moment. Soon the all of the classrooms including yours came bursting out with people screaming.

It was completely nuts to where you had to stay put or you'd get tackled by over a thousand students. A few minutes went by and you figured it was safe to get up, but immediately you knew what all the chaos came from.
It was a reaction to what was a Zombie apocalypse.

Personally you never were in to this thing so you had no idea how to properly survive it. But common instincts arose that finding a group of people was the best solution. Then your thoughts came to Takashi, he's your old buddy and it seemed natural to find and meet up with him hopefully surviving this craziness.

However the second you turned around the hallways became filled with "them". One was coming closer and you were unarmed. You then looked around for a weapon and you then picked up...
11423.title: Class dismissed

114231.content:
You picked up a metal yard stick from near the teacher's desk and hold it good and tight. You then aim the tip of it near it's head and then thrust it right in to it's brain. The thing collapsed on the floor with the stick still in it's brain.

You easily manage to pick it up right out of it and start to find people. More accurtely "live" people. You make it to the hallway to see "them" on each side of the hallway. But then you hear screaming from one side of the hallway to the right. It defiantly sounds like a girl screaming but not in pain so it could be she's alive.

But in the opposite direction you see that there is some skinny dude cornered by "them" and might die if you don't do something. You only have time to save one...
114231.title: Gathering a group Part 1 (A)

1142311.content:
Your instincts tell you to save the dude since you actually know he can be saved. You hold the stick with two hands while running toward the first thing you can swing at in hopes it's the opening you need.

The guy starts screaming like he's about to die when one of "them" falls down knocking another one over giving him an opening to escape. "Come on let's go!", you said picking up the guy from the ground and leaving down the flight of stairs near you.

You two manage to get in to a classroom to take a breather before setting out again. You close the doors hoping it'll keep
"them" out.

"Holy shit, thanks I thought I was a goner.", the guy you just saved thanked.

"No problem, what's your name?", you asked.

"Tomoko, and yours is?", he asked.

"Haru.", you answered.

"Well I owe you one Haru. Thanks BTW any idea what the hell is going on?", asked Tomoko.

"No idea. But it's safe to say things aren't going to be easy for us. Were going to be doing some very insane shit until things get sorted out. So I want you to listen to me, can you follow my lead until we find a group?", you said.

"Yeah I guess so. I'll stay by your side if it means I can still live.", he answered.
1142311.title: Save the dude (Go Left)

1142312.content:
Your emotions said that there might be a chance to save someone from certain death since the girl was probably in immediate danger. But it meant leaving the guy to die.

You then hesitantly ran to the right hoping it wasn't in vain. You saw a girl being grabbed by "them" and was about to be eaten down the flight of stairs. You then swung your stick at it's head causing it to die for sure.

You grabbed her by the arm and took her down the staircase holding yourselves up in a classroom. It wasn't a long term solution but it gave you two a moment to take a breather from all the madness.

"Thank you I thought I was dead for sure that time.", she said.

"No problem. What's your name?", you asked.

"Yuuta, and seriously thank you I really owe you big time for that.", she thanked you again.

"Again no big deal. The names Haru.", you said.

"Haru, seriously I owe you my life and I'll stay by your side to repay that debt.", she said like an oath.

"All I need to know is that can you stay by my side all the way throughout this thing. Not just getting out of here and finding a group but also until when this entire thing clears up?", you asked.

"Absolutely I'm at your side until the end.", she said with confidence.

It seemed like things weren't so bleak right now after all but you still had to find a group in order to survive this thing.
1142312.title: Save the girl (Go Right)

114232.content:
You take out a screwdriver right from the teacher's desk and then carefully aim it at the thing's head. You grasp it tightly and then stab it right in it's head. It collapses on the floor but it lands face first meaning that you just lost your weapon.

You couldn't stay any longer since you needed to find some people who were still alive. You then enter the hallway to see that there are a few of "them" on both ends of the hallway.

You then hear a girl screaming from the right. It doesn't sound like she's in pain so she's still alive. But to the left there's some dude who's backed into a corner by "them". You only have time to save one...
114232.title: Gathering a group Part 1 (B)

1142321.content:
You do not have a weapon so that only means you can only just shrug off "them". It is extreamly dangerous but you have to do something! You runover and with all your might shove them so that the guy can escape. However "they" get up and try to grab the both of you, and "they" are coming from the staricase. This leaves you with very little options.

You decide to book it over to the other staircase where you heard that girl scream. However the things that were nearby that very staircase were starting to come towards you and yor companion. You had to do something in order to distract them so you grabbed something from the ground and threw it near the windows where "they" were near.

Amazingly it worked! This gave you an opening to get out of there, but that same girl who you eard screaming was still being attacked by one of "them". Miraculously she wasn't bitten at least yet. However that guy you rescued threw it off the staircase making it fall head first on the floor.

"Come on! Let's get out of here!", he said.

You all hid inside one of the classrooms and shut the doors. That was without a doubt the closest thing you ever went through in your life. You were amazed that you rescued two survivors and none were bitten.

"Thanks for getting me out of there man. Didn't think I'd make it.", said the guy.

"Thank you for saving me. What's your name?", asked the girl.

"Tomoko. And your name?", he asked.

"Yuuta, and who's that guy?", she asked.

You took a moment to collect yourself and said your name, "It's Haru. Glad you both are alive, can't beleive that me and him got to you in time.", you said.

"Well I'm very greatfull. But what do we do?", Yuuta asked.

"We find more survivors. If we want to make it out of this mess we need a bigger group, there has got to be some othersin the school who are making an effort to get out of here. If we see any we'll help them out so we can earn their trust.", you excalimed.

"Were not going to do anything crazy right?", asked Tomoko.

"I mean by earning their trust by helping them get out of here. No point in trying to take over a group, we need people but not everyone is welcoming, besides they might only be accompanied by friends they trust. So we have to make them trust us, simple as that.", you explained.

"Well then let's go then let's find some weapons and get out of this place.", Yuuta said.
1142321.title: Save the dude (Go Left)

11423211.content:
(Armed with death http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=h6-9QF-qw...)

The three of you gathered what you could use from the classroom and prepared to make your way out of the school. "You both ready?", you asked before storming out.

"I'm ready", said Yuuta and Tomoko. You opened the door and started running through the hallway taking out any of "them" that got in your way. You used a school fire axe, Yuuta had a sword, and Tomoko used a lug wrench.

The three of you just stormed through not stopping for anything. As you were cutting up "them" you began to feel like this was second nature. Almost like this was your calling.

Yuuta slit their thraots and Tomoko bashed them right in their heads almost like they were hired guns. Something was changing in the three of you.

You all manage to find a spot to rest before moving on. It was a corner near the next flight of stairs with some vending machines on the walls.

Without a second thought you broke the glass and told them to take everything. They'll need to stack up on supplies in case they had to walk on foot. Yuuta grabbed one of the school bags lying on the floor and did what you said.

Then all of a sudden luck would have it that two survivors came by right to you. One was a fat nerd with glasses and the other a...very attractive girl with pink hair.

"Oh thank god people who are alive.", the nerd said.

"Who are you guys?", asked Tomoko.

"I'm Takagi, and this gun enthusiastic otaku is Kohta.", she said.

"The names Haru, this is Tomoko, and Yuuta. Were looking for any group of survivors looking to get out of here.", you replied.

"Well we haven't come across any survivors but I suppose the five of us stand a very good chance. What are you skills? Kohta is the gun expert and I'm a genius.", she said.

"We all have good experience with melee weapons.", you answered.

"That's good. There's a few things you should know about "them". They can't see and noise attracts them. So let that help keep you guys alive.

Alright we'll get down below and make our way through out of this place.
11423211.title: Gathering a group Part 2 (B)

115.content: Chaos, normal or other powers?
115.title: Shizuka Marikawa.

info.brief_description: One or many girls from the Anime/Manga Highschool Of The Dead fall in love with you.
info.description:
This Interactive Story is based on Snakehead222's (a.k.a Venom and Anti-Venom) stories.
But they have their differences.
Let's get to the rules, shall we?

1-There MUST be a chaos option;

2-In the chaos option, the character's name MUST be Leon Seiryu;

Here's a link to Leon's bio: http://maexam.deviantart.com/art/Character-s-Bio-Leon-304172654

3-In the "normal" branch, do whatever you want. Just make sure you use proper grammar, make a good story and no one line chapters, except for choices;

4-I'll allow sex, just don't go overboard (i.e: don't write about sex every two or five chapters) and some yuri (in the Harem choices only);

5-Please write a warning chapter when you're going to write about anything that is sex related and say what it contains. Example: Say if the chapter will contain threesomes, yuri, normal sex, etc...

6-Don't kill the main charcter or any supporting characters, except bad guys (like Shido: http://moe.animecharactersdatabase.com/uploads/chars/4758-172727672.jpg , http://randomc.net/image/HIGHSCHOOL%20OF%20THE%20DEAD/HIGHSCHOOL%20OF%20THE%20DE...)

Here's a link to the wikia: http://highschool-of-the-dead.wikia.com/wiki/Highschool_of_the_Dead_Wiki
